channel.description: Recent content in raw on Claudio Noguera

item.title: Converting DNG to jpeg
item.description: I shoot most of my pictures in RAW with my Nikon D90. Once I transfer them to my computer, I change the format to DNG (I am not sure if this is useful or not, but NEF is Nikon’s proprietary format whereas DNG is standard, backed by Adobe and -in theory- future proof). However, raw formats are not useful for quick previewing and most machines do not support it natively (Macs do support it, though).
